title: Everything you need to know to interpret a dream about a belt in a dream

preview.html: Interpretations of the dream area: The belt can appear in a dream in different forms, whether it is a women’s bag belt, or a waist belt made of leather or one of the metals, and seeing it in a dream has many connotations that range from negative to positive comparisons about the dreamer’s condition and the details that he saw in his dream, This is what appeared from the words of scholars in interpreting the vision of a belt in a dream. Interpretation of a belt in a dream According to the translators, the term “zone” is linked to the concept of stability, rigor, and decisive decisions taken by the viewer in the problems he faces, and there are still many interpretations related to this dream. Imam Nabulsi said that it indicates Positive changes and another stage in his life that he reached after his thinking matured and he was able to develop his skills. His vision of a young man means that he is determined to follow the path of building his future and will not worry about the past or look back. In the case of a well-tied belt, this is a sign of wisdom and thought that is coming in End with the right decisions. If it is not tied well, which leads to it being separated from its place, then this is evidence of the dreamer’s triviality and his interest in things that are not useful in his life. A loose belt in a married man’s dream indicates that he is not performing his household duties as he should, and his severe failure in Providing for his family, especially his wife, who finds nothing but neglect and abandonment from him. The girl you see in your dream looks beautiful around her waist, and this indicates that her marriage to the young man she loves is imminent. There are many types of belts, including expensive belts made of natural leather or metals. Precious, and this vision expresses the extent of the luxury that the viewer experiences, yet he does not forget the right of others to him and tries to find a balance between everything that does not fall behind in any of them against his will. The golden belt in Ibn Sirin’s dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that fastening the belt is evidence of making a decision. Important in critical matters, and that there is no possibility of going back no matter what happens. He also said that when a man in trade sees a belt around his waist, he is currently thinking about a new project, but he needs a comprehensive study to make the right decision. As for a married woman, seeing a belt shows her life with Her husband, whether she is happy or miserable, tying her belt indicates calm and stability, and an untied belt indicates serious disturbances in her relationship with her husband. With a little wisdom and intelligence, she can get rid of it and return her life to its usual stability. If a woman ties it tightly around her waist, she lives at this time in happiness and contentment, but if she looses this belt of her own free will, then she abandons her responsibilities and cares only about herself, and she can resort to requesting separation from her husband. . To gain her complete freedom away from the burdens of home and children. The young man who sees this dream in his dream is evidence of his ambitions that he seeks to achieve and seeks to achieve, and whatever obstacles or difficulties he faces, he considers them a motivation to continue and not a reason for despair and disappointment. Gold belt in a dream Gold belt in

title: Interpretation of a train in a dream: Traveling by train in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the dream is that she does not enter the train for a single woman. The train in a dream is one of the very strange and confusing dreams that we see in our dreams all the time and causes a lot of anxiety for the person to get the correct interpretation of the dream, as the train is one of the means. Transportation in our daily life is very continuous, and sometimes we see in our dreams that we are driving a train in the dream, or the train collides with us, and various other dreams in which the train appears and appears often. Imam Al-Sadiq, the famous dream interpreter, told us, in his interpretations, about many important meanings conveyed by the dream of a train, Which the dreamer must know, interprets the dream correctly and completely through his knowledge and condition. Interpretation of seeing a train in a dream: The train that was moving quickly in the dream and was in the form of a trailer indicates that the dreamer will fall into something that causes him anxiety and confusion, but he will end the matter well. The train is evidence of a journey in which the dreamer escapes from the pressures of life and the routine that he is going through, whether At work or in family life, the train indicates the changes that the dreamer will face in his life and heralds a new step in the future. If the train is slow, the dreamer’s suffering will be prolonged and he will suffer loss in his coming days. If the train is long, the dream shows the influence that the dreamer has. The train indicates Long also indicates a trip to a nearby place, and from this trip the dreamer will gain material things, but if it is slow, it will prevent the dreamer from traveling. If you are driving the train, you are moving towards the right thing in life. If you wait at the station for the train to come, there will be a change in your favor. If you drive your car for a long time, something you expected will be delayed. If the period is short, what you expected happened quickly. Traveling abroad means moving from one place to another and moving from one country to another. Whoever sees that he is traveling, he will wipe the earth, and whoever searches the earth will also travel. Whoever travels in a dream from one place to another that is better than him means that he will move from one situation to another. If the dreamer sees himself traveling by plane, he will obtain an important position in society or in the work that he will do. Anyone who travels to another country may mean that he will divorce his wife and marry another. Whoever travels and sees that he does not He returns and will not return, so it means that he will die or that his death is near. Traveling indicates people’s morals, and if the traveler is poor, he is self-sufficient, and returning from a trip is a dream of repentance, and whoever moves to an unknown house, then he is travelling. Traveling in a dream indicates escaping from reality to a land of imagination where he tries The dreamer wants to forget the fatigue and pain that he faces in his daily life as a result of the problems he faced in his life. Interpretation of a train in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Getting off the train in a dream is evidence that you have lost something dear. A slow train in a dream is evidence of the approaching term. The speed of a train in a dream is evidence of Completing many projects. Seeing a train passing at a slow speed in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of the imminent term. Seeing yourself getting off the train in a dream is evidence of lettuce.

title: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from animals for a married woman

preview.html: Are you thinking about this dream and the hints and meanings it carries? Interpretation of seeing escaping from animals in a dream for a single girl. If the girl raises predatory animals during her sleep, this indicates that what she seeks will be achieved, God willing. The attack of lone predators reflects her feelings during this time and what she is going through. Chasing an animal at work could be a sign of being fired from this job. God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When you see an animal running away, this is a sign that there are people who are unfaithful towards it and want to harm it. When a girl runs away from insects in a dream, this indicates that people are talking about her. She feels tired and hurt by these words. Seeing the same girl hiding inside a house for fear of an unknown animal is a sign that God is saving her and protecting her from those who want to harm her, and God knows best. A monkey in a dream indicates an inappropriate person who will propose marriage to her in order to bond with her. He must He takes this dream as a strong warning, because he does not have good good qualities, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A young driver who dreams of an unmarried girl is good news for marrying a man who has good and good qualities and is a sincere man. See also: Running away from a cow in a dream. Interpretation of watching Animals escaping in a dream for a married woman. A yellow cow in a dream for a married woman is good news of the arrival of a year full of happiness for her, God willing. Unlike a sick cow, it symbolizes that the year will be difficult for her, and God knows best. Seeing a frog in a dream is good news that he is close to God Almighty and is trying to be Close to every person who approaches God. When a woman sees a sheep in her dream, it means that there is a man spying on her and watching her. If one sees a pig in a dream, it may be a conspiracy from a person who has nothing but evil in his heart. She should pray and pray to God to protect her Of these people. The white rabbit in a dream was also praised, because it indicates that something good will happen to him, God willing. When a married woman sees a disease suffering from a vision of pregnancy, her term is near, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. But seeing pregnancy in a dream indicates The possibility of traveling abroad. Also, the buffalo in the dream symbolizes the acquisition of goodness, due to its continuous efforts to obtain the goodness that it wants. And the whale, when a married woman sees it, her passage may be in distress, but God will comfort her. Interpretation of seeing a person running away from animals in a dream and its meaning: When He sees himself trying to escape without knowing where he is going. A sign of surprise that will come to him in the form of travel, but it will bring him fatigue, God willing. He knows best. But if a predator bites a man after attacking him in a dream. This is a sign that something bad will happen to him and he may be hated. Attacking animals Predatory animals in a dream. This dream may indicate the instability of marital life, which may lead to divorce between them, and God knows best. Killing a predator is good news for overcoming problems. Read also: Interpretation of escaping in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. The meaning of seeing escaping from animals in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing animals As it takes place, it symbolizes the disappearance of problems that arise

title: Interpretation of a black face in a dream: Seeing black skin in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the blackness of the face of an unmarried girl married to a pregnant woman, the darkness of the body, I dreamed of a black person, the face of my husband, a woman, a black face, the darkness of the ugly dead, the face of Ibn Sirin. Seeing skin or skin in general in a dream is a sign of the veil that the dreamer covers in reality. If the skin If the skin is black or ugly, then the dream indicates bad deeds that the dreamer hides from others. The color of the skin or face turning black in the dream is a sign of distance from God and abandonment of worship and obedience. Whoever saw in His dream is that his face or skin has originally turned black, meaning otherwise, his vision indicates weak faith and a bad opinion of his morals and religion. But whoever sees in his dream that his face is black and he is wearing white clothes, then this dream indicates the girl who will give birth to him in a few days. Coming up. If a person sees a black face in a dream and wears dirty clothes and clothing, then his vision indicates hypocrisy, lying to God, and abandonment of religion. As for someone who sees in his dream that his face has turned black as if it is covered with dirt, then his vision indicates the approach of his death and the nearness of his death. It has been said that seeing the color of the face or skin darker in a dream for someone who has strength and courage in reality is a sign of cowardice and weakness that befalls him. Dark skin in a dream can indicate wealth and money in some cases. Whoever sees in his dream black or black skin, and that person was in reality. Apart from that, the dream indicates the money and wealth that the person possesses in reality and the black woman, in reality, if one sees her in a dream, then seeing her shows the kindness and liveliness that will come to the dreamer in the life of Waking interpretation of black face - YouTubeSeeing the sister is black face - YouTubeDream of dark face - YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of seeing sandalwood in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sandalwood in a dream: How many times has sandalwood been seen in a dream? Many times, his hero's dream was to wear sandals, and seeing it is one of the common dreams that many people have and always want to find an explanation for. There are many forms of seeing sandalwood in a dream, and each shape and color has its own interpretation, and the interpretation varies depending on the nature of the person who saw the wood. Sandals in a dream. There are many interpretations that include all the shapes that we see in a dream about sandalwood, and we follow them in the following lines. What is the interpretation of buying sandals in a dream? Buying sandals in a dream is a common dream for many people, as a person dreams of buying new sandals, and the color of the sandals may vary. From one dream to another, so there are different interpretations of buying sandals in a dream. Ibn Shaheen went to the fact that buying sandals in a dream means joy and happiness that will soon overtake a person, and if there are difficult problems facing this person, he will overcome them. Buying sandals of the appropriate size in The dream means that the person will receive happy news, especially with an important and useful trip. As for buying tight sandals in a dream, they show many obstacles standing between the person and the trip that was expected to be completed. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of buying yellow sandalwood as a sign of illness. A person or his marriage to a sick woman. Buying green sandals in a dream for a woman means good conditions and meeting her needs, and for a single man it means marriage to a fair woman, and for a married man this indicates a good state of his circumstances. If an unmarried girl sees herself buying golden shoes, this indicates Indicates that she will marry a fair, tall man. If one sees that he is buying a lot of sandals in his dream, this indicates his desire to improve his circumstances and his dissatisfaction with his life. A married woman dreaming of buying children’s shoes indicates her longing for children and hearing recent news about a new baby. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. What is the interpretation of seeing sandalwood in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin gave several different interpretations of seeing sandals in a dream, and these interpretations varied according to the color, shape, nature and material of the shoe. Ibn Sirin’s interpretations differed. Sirin to see sandalwood in a dream depends on the gender of the person who saw the dream and the difference in his social status, in addition to the nature of the dream itself and the events that the person narrates. Ibn Sirin says about seeing sandalwood in a dream that it indicates a trip and the subject of the trip varies according to the nature of the sandalwood, its shape and color. If one sees himself wearing sandals and walks a lot with them, he will have the opportunity to travel in the coming days. Wearing green-colored sandals is interpreted as traveling to the Holy Lands to perform Hajj or Umrah. Seeing cut sandals means that something will happen that prevents the person from traveling. A person who sees high-heeled black sandals in a dream indicates that this person has reached the highest levels of success

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a gorilla?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla in a dream: It is one of the things that can cause anxiety and panic to many, given the general shape of the gorilla, and it is one of the unfavorable animals for a large group of people, and in the article we will shed light on the different meanings that this vision can bring. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla. Interpretation of a dream symbolizes Gorillas generally lead to trouble and the viewer is exposed to great and huge financial hardships, and if the person has great wealth and many doors to goodness, the vision indicates that he will lose all his money or allocations. The vision can indicate a healthy death and suffering from diseases. If one sees a gorilla and is happy to see it and wants to look at it for as long as possible, then the vision indicates that the dreamer is characterized by a number of bad qualities such as cunning, evasiveness, and deception as well. As hypocrisy. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla by Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing a gorilla in a dream is an unpleasant and unpleasant dream, because it indicates the lack of purity of a person’s intention and lack of kindness in his heart. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a gorilla explains that the dreamer is planning a sin and the vision may indicate weak faith. The dreamer and his drift behind his desires, desires, and whims, and he must fear God before it is too late, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a gorilla in her dream, this means that an incompetent person will offer her marriage in the near future and that this person has a great ability to deceive and cunning. And if this girl agrees to be with him, she will do so. He suffers with him as he destroys her religion and makes her commit many sins and disobedience against her will, and God knows best. Seeing one gorilla indicates the presence of a person near her with bad behavior, and if this girl has an emotional relationship with someone, then the vision warns her against continuing this relationship, as the other party is The person who manipulates her feelings and desires. To distort her reputation and expose her among the people. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla attacking a single woman. If an unmarried woman saw a gorilla attack in a dream and was frightened and frightened by it, or tried to get rid of it but to no avail, this means that she will be exposed to some problems and difficulties in the coming period, and also indicates the presence of some unjust people. The good people are in the circle of friends, and they show her the opposite of what they represent and want to harm her. A single woman’s vision of a gorilla attack suggests that the enemy is lurking and she is suffering from illness or failure in plans. If the unmarried woman is planning to get a job or aspires to reach a better position, then the vision warns her of a miserable failure, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla for a married woman: The vision of a married gorilla symbolizes her relationship with an invalid person, and this husband is likely to control the traits of cunning and deception and can avoid And show the opposite of its truth. If a married woman sees a gorilla in her bed, this means that she is suffering from some problems that will greatly affect her psyche, and it is most likely that these problems will be between her and her husband, because they may arise due to the husband’s lack of attention. Piety for her. And piety, either through manipulation
preview.text: Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla in a dream: It is one of the things that can cause anxiety and panic to many, given the general shape of the gorilla, and it is one of the unfavorable animals for a large group of people, and in the article we will shed light on the different meanings that this vision can bring. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla. Interpretation of a dream symbolizes Gorillas generally lead to trouble and the viewer is exposed to great and huge financial hardships, and if the person has great wealth and many doors to goodness, the vision indicates that he will lose all his money or allocations. The vision can indicate a healthy death and suffering from diseases. If one sees a gorilla and is happy to see it and wants to look at it for as long as possible, then the vision indicates that the dreamer is characterized by a number of bad qualities such as cunning, evasiveness, and deception as well. As hypocrisy. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla by Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing a gorilla in a dream is an unpleasant and unpleasant dream, because it indicates the lack of purity of a person’s intention and lack of kindness in his heart. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a gorilla explains that the dreamer is planning a sin and the vision may indicate weak faith. The dreamer and his drift behind his desires, desires, and whims, and he must fear God before it is too late, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a gorilla in her dream, this means that an incompetent person will offer her marriage in the near future and that this person has a great ability to deceive and cunning. And if this girl agrees to be with him, she will do so. He suffers with him as he destroys her religion and makes her commit many sins and disobedience against her will, and God knows best. Seeing one gorilla indicates the presence of a person near her with bad behavior, and if this girl has an emotional relationship with someone, then the vision warns her against continuing this relationship, as the other party is The person who manipulates her feelings and desires. To distort her reputation and expose her among the people. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla attacking a single woman. If an unmarried woman saw a gorilla attack in a dream and was frightened and frightened by it, or tried to get rid of it but to no avail, this means that she will be exposed to some problems and difficulties in the coming period, and also indicates the presence of some unjust people. The good people are in the circle of friends, and they show her the opposite of what they represent and want to harm her. A single woman’s vision of a gorilla attack suggests that the enemy is lurking and she is suffering from illness or failure in plans. If the unmarried woman is planning to get a job or aspires to reach a better position, then the vision warns her of a miserable failure, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla for a married woman: The vision of a married gorilla symbolizes her relationship with an invalid person, and this husband is likely to control the traits of cunning and deception and can avoid And show the opposite of its truth. If a married woman sees a gorilla in her bed, this means that she is suffering from some problems that will greatly affect her psyche, and it is most likely that these problems will be between her and her husband, because they may arise due to the husband’s lack of attention. Piety for her. And piety, either through manipulation

title: Interpretation of seeing two suns in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing two suns in a dream It is something that many may consider strange to the extreme because it does not exist in the nature in which we live, and therefore it is one of the dreams that carry meanings of good and evil, depending on the state of the dreamer and the state of the dream in general. Therefore, the Encyclopedia website provides you with a detailed interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of seeing two suns in a dream The sun in a dream means a bright future, especially if that sun makes you feel warm and comfortable. This dream means that the seer will be in a high position, and have the influence and authority that makes him serve the people. Therefore, seeing the sun can be a new success that you will achieve at work and then get the appropriate promotion. As for seeing two suns in the daytime sky, this means that the dreamer has one of the options that will turn his life upside down. That is, he is lost and cannot choose, but this dream is evidence that both options are good. But he must choose the best for himself with sound thinking and organized planning, but at the same time. The sleeper dreams in his dream that he is in front of two suns and with him a friend who convinces him that it is something normal. This is evidence of a plot from this friend and he is planning to deceive you about incorrect things. This is either because he wants you to fall into evil or a conspiracy, or he made a mistake in the past and does not want you to know about it. Regarding the interpretation of seeing two suns in a dream, it appears in the sky to extinguish darkness and darkness. It is a source of light, because this is evidence that The seer is in distress, perhaps financial problems. Either he is sick, or he is waiting for something he has longed for very much, and therefore the two suns here mean. The comfort that comes after sadness, but that the seer will get more than he wished for, and it also means seeing. That there is a lot of joy and happiness that will come to the seer after a long period of sadness and anxiety. If the sleeper sees that the sun rises at night, this is evidence of his misguidance, and making a lot of effort. To prove illusory things because they will not benefit him and will not bring him good, the person must here recalculate. And start seeing things realistically and not the way he wants, because the interpretation of seeing two suns in a dream Those who shine at night are also an indication of the problems that a person may face. Because of his wrong thinking and the things that he is convinced of only, which are not correct or real. Here the divine must be vigilant and flexible in thinking, so as not to see himself in a great predicament that he cannot get out of. Seeing more than one sun in a dream Seeing more than one sun in a dream is red, and this indicates the emergence of many problems in the fortuneteller's life. These problems will not make his life as it is and may It will be the reason that he will lose many people. And if a man or woman sees that he is performing Hajj, and while circling the Kaaba, two or more suns shine in the sky. This is evidence of the noble morals that the divine possesses and his great mind. Perhaps this will be a reason for him to open all the closed doors, and he has a lot of faith and approaches God in the right way. But if the man or woman is in fact not religious

title: Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a dead mother or father in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a quarrel with a deceased father or mother in a dream In this article, we present to you the interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a deceased father or mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a deceased father or mother in a dream If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is arguing with his father or mother, this indicates that the parents are dissatisfied with their son’s behavior. This vision represents a warning to the dreamer to re-examine himself, stop his weakness, and follow the path of guidance. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with the dead in a dream If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is quarreling with a dead person and then reconciles with him, this is good luck. But if the sleeper quarrels in his dream with a good dead person, this is an unpleasant vision and an indication of the fallacy of the Messenger. And if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is arguing with an angry dead man, this is a sign of great problems and difficulties in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with neighbors in a dream If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is quarreling with his neighbors or with a stranger and kills someone, or the matter develops into the use of weapons and the fight reaches its climax, leading to the dreamer’s imprisonment, this vision is an indication that the person is not important. This vision also shows that life The dreamer is free from responsibility and that he is a frivolous person without a goal. Interpretation of a dream of quarreling with friends in a dream Seeing a quarrel with friends in a dream is a good vision. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is arguing with his friend or friends and in reality there are problems between them, this is a sign that he will reconcile with them. However, if there are no problems between the dreamer and his friends and he sees in his dream that he is arguing with them, this is evidence of their love for each other and their fear of the feelings of others. Interpretation of a dream of marital disputes in a dream If a married woman sees in her dream that she is entering into an argument or quarreling with her husband or her husband's family, this is just a discharge of her negative energy. This vision shows that the wife was not able to respond to her husband and his family at the time of the dispute, so she responds in dreams and in this dream there is relief from thought. It also indicates that the wife's family faces many problems with her in reality. Interpretation of a dream of quarreling with brothers in a dream Arguing with brothers in a dream is an indication of news, and it is a welcome vision, completely opposite to what you see. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is arguing with his brothers, this is a sign of the love that unites him with his brothers. Seeing a dispute between siblings In a dream, it indicates good relations and reconciliation between siblings in reality. Interpretation of a dream of quarreling with the father and mother in a dream Some dream interpreters believe that arguing in a dream does not necessarily mean enmity with someone, but it may just be a discharge of the negative energy of the viewer. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is in conflict with his family, especially with his father and mother, this indicates the need for insight into tenderness and affection. And the sleeper seeing that his mother or father is hitting him in a dream is good evidence and evidence that he will benefit from his parents. Interpretation of a dream of a quarrel with an unknown woman in a dream Seeing a fight with an unknown woman in a dream are unfortunate visions. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is arguing with an unknown woman, this is evidence that the visionary is already suffering from hatred

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating strawberries from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about eating red strawberries, and the interpretation of a dream about eating strawberries and raspberries.

preview.html: Which – Seeing a dream about eating strawberries in a dream indicates happiness and pleasure. There is no doubt that its delicious taste and happy color have happy meanings for the dreamer, so we find that seeing it is good news for him, but we must know all the meanings through it, and for married people and hope during the article.Interpretation of a dream about eating strawberries by Ibn Sirinma. Interpretation of a dream about eating strawberries? Eating strawberries in a dream indicates goodness. The abundance that awaits the dreamer in his future to compensate for all the sadness and sorrow that he lost. The vision expresses the achievement of the goals and aspirations that the dreamer wants in his life, so he must always be optimistic that his Lord will always give him better than what he desires. The vision is also a sign of goodness and abundance of food for the dreamer, especially If the strawberry is red in color. If it is yellow, this means that the dreamer will suffer from fatigue during this period, but he will pass this fatigue well after a while. If the strawberry is green, this foretells the dreamer of obtaining a lot of money at the first opportunity. Even if its color is Son, this leads the dreamer to some harm and exhaustion during this period, but he must pray to his Lord over and over again until this worry ends. The vision expresses the dreamer’s superiority in his studies or work, so it will be a wonderful relationship that he did not expect before in terms of prosperity and stability. Go to Google and type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site and you will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about eating strawberries according to Ibn Sirin? Imam Ibn Sirin sees in this dream a sign of blessing and kindness, especially if the dreamer sees it in red and takes it while he is happy. If the dreamer is single, this portends her close marriage, which will make her All her desires for love, happiness, money, and children are fulfilled. If the dreamer is single, this indicates his relationship and marriage with a girl who loves him and respects him. Seeing strawberries in a bad appearance and brown in color means that the dreamer will feel nauseous during this period, so he should be patient with this illness and pray to his Lord to Heal him and relieve him of this fatigue gently. If the dreamer sees that he is picking strawberries, this indicates a successful life free of problems and adversity as he finds comfort in all aspects of his life. The vision indicates that the dreamer will hear happy news these days, which will make him happy and endlessly happy. If The strawberry had a delicious taste and its color was red and beautiful. This indicates the wonderful nature of her partner, as he has hidden and good qualities that make her happy with him. But if the strawberry has a bad taste and color, this leads to an unsuccessful choice of her life partner, but she must be patient and pray to her Lord who chooses. He always does the right thing for her and changes the situation as he wants. Perhaps her vision reflects her wonderful treatment of everyone around her and her good qualities that make her stand out among her friends. Interpretation of the solution
